Package org.drools.brms.client.decisiontable

Class Summary
DecisionTableXLSWidget This widget deals with XLS files in "classic" decision tables.
DeleteAction This shows the widget for deleting a row.
EditableDTGrid The decision table viewer and editor.
EditActions This shows the widgets for editing a row.
InsertAction This shows the widget for inserting a row.
MergeAction This shows the widget for merging cells in a row.
ShuffleAction This shows the widget for moving a row up or down.
ShuffleDownAction This shows the widget for moving a row down.
ShuffleUpAction This shows the widget for moving a row up.
Toolbar This shows the widget for moving a row up or down.
